entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story who suddenly develops gills and webbed hands and feet.

entities.name: lake
entities.description: A body of water where Harry jumps into to breathe through his new gills.

relationships.description: Harry has developed gills that allow him to breathe underwater.
Harry's hands and feet have become webbed, allowing him to swim more efficiently.
The lake contains water that Harry can breathe through his new gills.
